member.name: T:DG.DemiGUI.DeSkinColor
member.summary: Contains both free and pro skins color variations, and automatically returns the correct one when converted to Color

member.name: T:DG.DemiGUI.DeColorPalette
member.summary: Stores a color palette, which can be passed to default DeGUI layouts when calling DeGUIManager.BeginGUI, and changed at any time by calling DeGUIManager.ChangePalette. You can inherit from this class to create custom color palettes with more color options.
